title: Item Sets
body: My friend has an issue with his mac becuz he cant drag his items plz fix this

replies.body:
This is a *known issue* with Macs running 10.12 Sierra. The only workaround at this time is to manage item sets on a computer **not** running 10.12 Sierra. Item sets are saved to the cloud, so any changes they make on another computer will transfer over on their Mac.

Let me know if you have any questions.

I know this is irrelevant to this section of the boards.

But after item sets' recent time in the spotlight due to controversy over their proposed removal. Is there any news as to the stance/opinion riot has in regards to keeping them around VS removing them?

Kind regards,
KrakenKnight


Ps: If it's likely a yes.... please try not to reset them ;)
